::Magmatron::

    He got a blip that a Destron pod had landed. He sent a w=
orker Drone to go and get it. And Egg opened and the drone crawled out of t=
he base and headed for the new Destron.

(They are too small to be detected=
 at all, and they don't have Sparks.)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: kinger01030@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, November 1=
9, 2000 5:08 PM
  Subject: A destron for the ages


  A blast came from the=
 sky. As a shooting object landed in the forest. He 
  merged from the pod.=
 A destron. He stood up. A spider. His name charon. 
  Kepper of the jailed=
 back on the destron colony alpha 0. He had followed 
  someone here. But w=
hat he callled himself now. Was remained to be seen.

        eGroups Spons=
or
